title: DataParallel can't gather if scatter dimension is not zero and batch_size%num_devices!=0
body_html:
This happened to me on branch 0.3.1, built from source with system NCCL 1.3.5, CUDA 9.1 and cuDNN 7.1. Tried on 3 GPUs with compute capability 3.0.
Error looks like this:

ValueError: gather got an input of invalid size: got 1x1, but expected 3x1

Here's the stack trace.
body_text:
This happened to me on branch 0.3.1, built from source with system NCCL 1.3.5, CUDA 9.1 and cuDNN 7.1. Tried on 3 GPUs with compute capability 3.0.
Error looks like this:
ValueError: gather got an input of invalid size: got 1x1, but expected 3x1

Here's the stack trace.
body:
This happened to me on branch 0.3.1, built from source with system NCCL 1.3.5, CUDA 9.1 and cuDNN 7.1. Tried on 3 GPUs with compute capability 3.0.
Error looks like this:
```
ValueError: gather got an input of invalid size: got 1x1, but expected 3x1
```
Here's the [stack trace](https://gist.github.com/VladislavZavadskyy/9e4fae4f14950b71316204ffb54a193e).
